title: Another Devin Haney Disaster as Boxer’s Crypto Confession Goes Terribly Wrong
description: It’s only been a few days since Devin Haney found himself under fire—this time, from Rolando Romero, the outspoken fighter who may soon face Ryan Garcia in the ring.
